info: Rating, 5 stars,  · April 2024,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment: The place was booked for my family & they definitely liked the place. Its cozy & clean. It has all the features & facilities that you might need if you were coming from overseas. The host was very helpful & did everything possible to make us feel welcome. He went on beyond to allow my family to check in at the early hours of the night. Cant thank him enough. Overall fabulous!

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · March 2024,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: This is such a nice apartment to stay, i loved how nicely decorated it is and well thought out conveniences, specially the water filter and the washing machine is a life saver. The internet speed was good for my remote office. The host has communicated accurate and simple instructions, and responded timely. The neighborhood is quiet which is nice. I will surely revisit.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · March 2024,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
This is my second visit here. Gym facility, Fast internet, Full kitchen facility and its Location make this apartment one of best choice. Also, many furniture are newly installed, which made the stay more comfortable. The host always promptly responds, and actively reflect our suggestions as well.
Thank you very much.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · January 2024,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: First I want to state that the host is great. He was very responsive and respectful and listened to our requests. My parents stayed at the house and informed the house was clean and location was great. I would highly recommend this place if you’re visiting dhaka.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · January 2024,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at an Airbnb during my visit in dhaka, and I must say that it was a memorable and delightful experience. From start to finish, everything was seamless and exceeded my expectations.
First and foremost, the host Nadeem was extremely welcoming and accommodating. They communicated promptly and made sure to provide clear instructions on how to find the property and access it. Upon arrival, I was pleasantly surprised by the warm and inviting atmosphere of the place. It was beautifully decorated, clean, and had all the necessary amenities to ensure a comfortable stay.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · January 2024,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
Safe, Quiet, Clean and convenient. All necessary home appliances are newly installed, all working fine. Many power sockets everywhere in the apartment, and all working fine. Trustworthy and helpful security guards. WiFi very fast and no problem in signal connectivity as well.
The host is always quickly responsive to my communication.
Best choice for 1 - 3 persons for the furniture availability for now.
Thank you very much, and I would love to come back again.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · December 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Mr.Chowdhury was so easy to communicate with that I was able to do a flexible early check in. His place is super cozy, decorated and clean. I loved the quiet neighborhood and the easy walk to the park and grocery store.I’ve been to many Airbnbs in Dhaka and this accommodation is definitely a top choice, strongly recommended. Thank you

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · December 2023
rating_comment: Very responsive host, always ready to help with everything, Very convenient location, right next to the Embassies. Getting an Uber is very quick and easy and the grocery store is 2min away. Also access in and out of the area is very simple. Thanks to the host for the help in everything, he also provided a place in the parking lot for the car for free ! I would recommend it to everyone
